entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 0.45

[shortdesc]

3M Hookit Clean Sanding Disc 236U, 55524, 3 in P320 C-weight, 50 per inner 250 per case

  • The 3M™ Hookit™ Clean Sanding Disc 236U features an innovative multi-hole design for improved dust extraction in finishing applications
  • 3M’s proprietary multi-hole pattern helps evacuate dust better than 5 or 6 hole products — increasing cut and dramatically increasing disc life
  • Open coat construction and a load-resistant coating further prevent clogging.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country Canada

    Product Information

  • Precise multi-hole pattern means excellent dust extraction and eliminates the need to align holes
  • Open coat and load-resistant coating prevents clogging to optimize cut and product life
  • 3M Hookit discs are easy to change and reuse, maximizing utility for the life of the disc
  • Aluminum oxide grains cut faster and last longer than traditional garnet
  • Strong, C-weight paper backing supports aggressive sanding

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 0.43

[shortdesc]

3M Hookit Film Disc 360L, 3 in x NH P400, 50 per inner 200 per case

  • The 3M Hookit Film Disc 360L features an aluminum oxide abrasive grain on a film backing for effective fine sanding on plastics, gel coats and polyurethane solid surface substrates
  • The sturdy film backing gives the durability needed for a high-production environment, and its excellent resistance to edge tearing provides longer life over discs with standard A-weight paper backings.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Aluminum oxide abrasive offers a fast cut and long life, and performs well on many surfaces
  • Durable film backing is tear-resistant and provides a close-tolerance, consistent finish
  • Open coat construction helps reduce loading and provides a more aggressive cut
  • 3M Hookit Disc is easy to change and reuse, maximizing utility for the life of the disc
  • Suitable for sanding and finishing on composites, gel coats, fiberglass, and other solid surface materials

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 1.35

[shortdesc]

3M Cubitron II Hookit Paper Disc, 732U, 220+, C-weight, 6 in x NH

  • 3M™ Cubitron™ II Hookit™ Clean Sanding Paper Disc 732U features 3M Precision Shaped Ceramic Grain, a revolutionary advancement in abrasive technology
  • The triangular shaped ceramic mineral is designed to slice through the substrate, rather than gouging or 'plowing' like conventional abrasives
  • This advanced technology results in a disc that cuts up to 2x as fast and lasts up to 4x as long as conventional abrasives.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • For best results, use with 3M™ Elite Orbital Sanders
  • Revolutionary 3M Precision Shaped Ceramic Grain technology provides fast cut and long life
  • Cuts up to 2x as fast and lasts up to 4x as long as conventional abrasives
  • Ideal for a wide variety of substrates and applications focused primarily on stock removal
  • Hook-and-loop attachment makes disc changes fast and easy
  • Precise multi-hole pattern provides superior dust extraction

entry.title: 3M 31368 - 3M Cubitron II Hookit Clean Sanding Abrasive Disc, 737U, 31368, 150+, 5 in (12.7 cm) 31368 7100069729
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 1.11

[shortdesc]

3M Cubitron II Hookit Clean Sanding Abrasive Disc, 737U, 31368, 150+, 5 in (12.7 cm)

  • 3M™ Cubitron™ II Hookit™ Clean Sanding Abrasive Disc 737U is a high quality automotive abrasive intended for autobody technicians that features a triangular shaped ceramic grain that helps deliver a fine, uniform finish
  • Its long-lasting grain and multi-hole pattern offers great dust extraction, making the disc ideal for paint removal, rough body filler shaping, fine featheredging or final prep before blending or priming.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Ceramic grain is electrostatically oriented to help form sharp peaks
  • 3M™ Hookit™ Attachment can be removed quickly for fast disc change-out
  • Individual edges in the shaped grain self-fracture to continually present a sharp cutting surface, making the cut more consistent and helping to prolong the life of the disc
  • Multi-hole pattern delivers excellent dust extraction
  • Long life and consistent finish
  • Easily slices through paint and body filler
    		•
